channel.title: Torvapkz v4 - 637 | PVP Server | Unlimited PK combinations | PERFECT SWITCHING
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/2zjjs4x.png[/img] ^---- Credits to TinyAsh11 for the Uber Amazing Banner, It's really a great banner! ----^
finally after 3 long months, Torvapkz v4 637 is finally complete!, for the 637 revision it is named v1, but in the Torvapkz series it is v4,
Download Source: [URL=http://up.ht/AEESOa]torvapkz ~637 v1 source~.rar - 167.9 MB[/URL]
Download Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xwhr99iyj52sfgo]Eclipse 639 Client.rar[/url]
the reason why the client still say's Eclipse is because i cba to include my custom client, sorry but i just can't do it as i am making this into a 637 rs remake, with regular rsps xp rates to prevent bordom, will have working nex, revenant caves, and many, many, more features!
enjoy some of these wonderful pictures about the server!:
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/freecodinghey.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/proof.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/starter.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/worldmap.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/caves.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/Startingskills.png[/img]
how to change the ip of the client!, open client, look for run eclipse 639.bat, edit that .bat file, look for 127.0.0.1 change to your no-ip, or vps ip address save the file and hit run, and enjoy, that is all you need to do, no compiler needed! :)
how to get curses
simply type ::curses true
how to make yourself admin, or mod
go to src/net/actionsender.java
search for mod austin, change to your name, for another admin search for nightmar3, change to your name, compile and re-run server, that's all you have to do! :)
any information you may need please contact austin and me at http://lmgtfy.com/?q=freecoding.smfnew.com
[IMG]http://i1212.photobucket.com/albums/cc446/lykand/torvapkz/2zjjs4x.png[/img]

item.title: Torvapkz v4 - 637 | PVP Server | Unlimited PK combinations | PERFECT SWITCHING
item.dc:creator: @deathdud89 deathdud89
item.description:
@deathdud89 wrote:

[quote=“ELiTeOnyxx, post:273, topic:430074”]great source i love it
1 question…how do you change the starter levels, items and bank? i looked in actionsender.java and couldnt find it
i mights just be dumb idk lol[/quote]

K dude go into cutscene.java and search for “player.getInventory().getContainer().add(new Item(995, 10000000));” (without quotes) and then u see a crap load of items that it puts in ur bank and starter for player. Change those or just remove them all and no more items in bank and inventory for starter.
PS also if u dont want the skills to be super high look right under the items for "player.getSkills().addExperience(0, 14000000); " delete all of those and now u dont get 99’s.
PM me for any other problems u got

Read full topic
